import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './SignIn.css'; import signupBackground from'./../../assets/images/tavern-7411977_1920.jpg' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuthComponent from '../AuthComponent/AuthComponent'; function SignIn() { const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [keepSignIn, setKeepSignIn] = useState(false); const handleTogglePassword = () => { setShowPassword(!showPassword); } const handleCheckboxChange = (e) => { setKeepSignIn(e.target.checked); } return (

Sign In account

Don't have any account? Sign up

Email address *

Password *

{showPassword ? (<> Hide) : (<> Show)}

Keep me signed in

) } export default SignIn;
